overview:
As the founder of Radian6 and its chief technology officer, Chris has established himself as a well respected, serial entrepreneur and successful inventor. His expertise lies in creating systems that can process massive volumes of real-time data including, monitoring, distilling and visualization. Chris has more than 10 years of hands-on experience in the areas of intrusion detection, network monitoring, analytics and data mining.

Prior to starting Radian6, Chris founded Q1 Labs, a successful network security management firm headquartered in Boston. He was the primary architect and developer of the Q1 Labs patented solution. Chris has also held a variety of senior technical positions at the University of New Brunswick.
